EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Warmest Wishes for Happy Holidays and a Happy New Year!
I can't believe we are one week away from Christmas! Before we know it, it will be the Spring Season and you will be off on your Spring Break Build Trip to Dominican Republic. I wanted to take this time to remind you that in a month the deadline for your final payment and forms will be coming up on January 15th. It has been such a great year and I appreciate all of you that I have connected with over the last few months!
Here are a few reminder items for the next few days:
Payment Deadline: * Your full payment is due: January 15th, 2016
Forms Attached to this Email: - Consent Forms - Child Protection Policy - Child Protection Policy Agreement - Letter to Donors - Packing List - Criminal Record Check *** This is very important that you apply for it at your local police station now, or you will not receive it by January 15th in time.
* Your forms are also due: January 15th, please email me if you are unsure of what you have submitted.
Booking your flights:
Airport: Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic - Airport Code: POP Arrival: March 11th, 2017 Departure: March 20th, 2017
If you have not booked your flight yet, now would be a great time to start looking over the next couple of weeks. Once you have booked your flights, please forward me your flight itinerary.
Wishing you all the Hope, Wonder, and Joy that the Season can bring!
Joy Yu Program Administrator
